commitResults.messageTitle: Level 1. Greet, Echo, Exit
Level 2: enable Add Task and List
Level 3: added Mark and Unmark methods to Task
Level 4: Added child classes (ToDo, Event, Deadline) to Parent Class (Task)
A-TextUiTesting: Input commands, checked expected and actual to be the same
Level 5: Handled 4 errors (ArrayIndexOutOfBound, IndexOutOfBound, InvalidCommand and EmptyTask)
Level 6: support for deleting tasks from the list
Improve last week code design
commitResults.messageBody: Remove Action and its respective sub-classes to change the implementation into just printing Strings

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 7: Add Save feature to write List into txt file
commitResults.messageBody: Create new Storage class to handle creation of new File and writing into the file

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-8: Added new LocalDate and LocalTime instances in Task
commitResults.messageBody: Convert String to LocalDate and LocalTime using new methods in Duke. Store deadline date and time in Task objects, instead of String.

commitResults.messageTitle: A-MoreOOP: Create Command class and its child classes
commitResults.messageBody: Command classes are to handle different type of user input and convert them into different type of command sub-classes

commitResults.messageTitle: A-MoreOOP: Modify the code design to adapt to OOP paradigm
commitResults.messageBody: More classes like Parser/Ui are created to make the code design more OOP

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Packages: Divide classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody: Organize the classes into suitable java packages.e.g., duke.task, duke.command, duke

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Gradle: Change mainClassName
commitResults.messageBody: To enable project to run in gradle

commitResults.messageTitle: A-JUnit: Use JUnit Test to automate testing of different classes
commitResults.messageBody: Set up and implement JUnit to test out Parser, Storage, Todo, and Task tests

commitResults.messageTitle: Add files for checkstyle
commitResults.messageBody: Configure build.gradle to use the two xml files added to perform checkstyle by following the style of SE-EDU

commitResults.messageTitle: Checkstyle and fix styling
commitResults.messageBody: Follow the standard style recommended by SE-EDU except adding javadoc, which will be done later

commitResults.messageTitle: Enable find task command
commitResults.messageBody: Users are now able to find task by searching the relavant keyword

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments
commitResults.messageBody: Add header comments to all non-private classes/methods.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change styling and add JavaDoc
commitResults.messageBody: Checkstyle and change to adapt to styling for Parser and insert comment of JavaDoc for newly merged FindCommand

commitResults.messageTitle: Setup JavaFX and make a simple GUI application with Hello World!
Design the layout of the Controls
Style the Controls to make the GUI fits the normal size.
Enable the GUI to echo the message of the user input in the TextField control
Add Dialog Boxes containing Label and Image, and add new package for frontend files
Add custom behavior (flipping Duke's DialogBox) to DialogBox
Rebuild the simple scho GUI Scene using FXML
Include Main class
Make the GUI able to adhere to the functionality of the backend code and improve the GUI
Enable Bot to greet when initialize and farewell when terminate
commitResults.messageBody:
Change the code design to adhere to the current GUI Fxml structure to
enable greet.

commitResults.messageTitle: Disable TextField and Button after exiting
commitResults.messageBody: Stop allowing user to type in or enter new command.

commitResults.messageTitle: Enhance GUI to display the pictures in circle frames
commitResults.messageBody: To make the GUI to look better and more related to real life product

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix styling by following the checkstyleMain
Configure to enable assert feature
commitResults.messageBody:
To be ready to document important assumptions that should hold at
various points in the code.

Testing of assert false in Parser class (now commented to ensure the
code runnable).

commitResults.messageTitle: Add assertions in MainWindow.java
commitResults.messageBody: Ensure the program execute with correct assumptions.

commitResults.messageTitle: DukeException: collate all exceptions thrown
commitResults.messageBody:
Restructure all the exceptions in the Command sub-classes (e.g.
AddCommand, FindCommand, MarkCommand, etc.) to make the code more
understandable.

Converting all the exceptions to DukeException with a message to be
display later on.

Let's catch all the exceptions appear then throw a new DukeException
with a new message embed. The DukeException is then handled on another
class.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor if-else statement into switch-case statement
commitResults.messageBody:
Improve code quality in classes AddCommand and Parser to make them more
organized.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use default branch in if-else statement
commitResults.messageBody:
if and else-if in MarkCommand now is explicitly stated. Else case
is use to detect error.

commitResults.messageTitle: Stop tracking duke.txt
Refactor the TaskList to achieve encapsulation
commitResults.messageBody:
Reduce the occurrence of using the method getList() and delegate the
work to all the other methods in TaskList (e.g. setTask, getSize, etc.)

commitResults.messageTitle: Reduce deep nesting in FindCommand
commitResults.messageBody: Extract out method to checkExistenceOfKeyword.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add new reminder feature
commitResults.messageBody:
Reminder class is created to generate reminder to remind user the
nearest coming task ahead.

It provides details such as countdown to the task from now.

commitResults.messageTitle: Format reminder to become user readable
commitResults.messageBody:
Convert Period to readable String so that user can understand and
add additional constraint to reminder (the nearest coming reminder must
not be done by the user).

commitResults.messageTitle: Enhance GUI to have better appearance
commitResults.messageBody: Change background colors, resize image and add padding to dislogbox

commitResults.messageTitle: Add User Guide
Rename jar file
Add initialization of duke.txt in root folder
Enhance display message if task list is empty
Fix bug to display full message without ellipsis
Add user guide
Add initialization of duke.txt
commitResults.messageBody:
If run of new device, the new duke.txt created will be added with a
few dummy tasks to let user to test them out

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix styling
